Detailed Description

Representation of a compartmental model.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CompModelInfo::CompModelInfo ( int  nCompartmentsIn,
int  nParametersIn,
int  nEquilibrimsIn,
double  relTolIn 
)

Constructor.

Initialize the model with the given attribute values and dummy compartments.

Parameters:
nCompartmentsIn The number of compartments in this system.
nParametersIn The number of basic PK parameters.
nEquilibrimsIn The number of quilibrim compartments.
relTolIn The relative tolerance (10^-(TOL+1)) where TOL is the of sigs user provide.

int CompModelInfo::getDefaultDose (  )  const

Returns the number of compartment that is set to receive dose.

The first compartment (=1) is set by default.

void CompModelInfo::getInitialOff ( std::vector< bool > &  initial_off  )  const

Returns a vector of boolean values where the i-th element indicates as to whether the corresponding compartment is to be turned off initially.

Field Documentation

bool CompModelInfo::is_pkFunctionOfT [private]

A flag indicating as to whether the PK model is a function of T.

true means it is a function of T.

int CompModelInfo::nParameters [private]

The number of PK parameters.

Note:
for developers: We don't really understand what this number stands for at this point. The value is not currently used.
